event_name: Halloween in Havana
description: Forget the cold and step into a night of tropical terror! This Friday, October 31st, Mangos Kitchen Bar is throwing the hottest Halloween in Havana party in the city! Costume Contest: Show off your most creative costume (tropical-spooky themes encouraged!) and win incredible prizes! Tropical Drink Specials: Sip on Havana-inspired cocktails and spooky specials all night.

description: Beginner salsa lesson, no partner required! This beginner lesson will be taught by Leilani, our salsa specialist. Sign up on your own and be paired in class, or bring a partner with you and save some $$! Single tickets = $20 + fees Couples tickets = $35 + fees

description: Get ready for the ultimate Salsalloween fiesta! 'Caliente Halloween' is taking over Mangos. Come join us for a spooktacular night of salsa dancing. Put on your best costume and dance the night away to Latin beats under the stars. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, this event is perfect for everyone. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to celebrate Halloween in style with a twist of Latin flair.

description: Experience the vibrant rhythms of Colombian traditional dance at the Latin Plaza Hub in Vancouver’s Gastown. This cultural workshop highlights the joy and history of dances like cumbia, mapalé, and bambuco, each blending Indigenous, African, and Spanish influences into a powerful expression of identity and celebration.

event_name: RHYTHM of THE NiGHT
description: An extra special night of non-stop nostalgia - queer 4 queer warehouse dance party. A tribute to the 90s club kid culture. Dress to impress, looks highly encouraged. Cash prize for best club kid look. Bewitching beats with DJs serving up throwbacks, divas, 90s dance, disco, y2k, remixes, classic house, guilty pleasures, lip sync worthy beats, voguing, dance floor hits, queer icons, new wave, synth, vintage rave, eurodance, electropop, 90s and 00s hip hop, 80s and 90s electronic, early 2000s dance. Ghastly performances and supernaturally sexy gogos. Spine-chilling electric circus visuals fantasy by QBM. Partial proceeds donated to the Downtown Eastside Women’s Centre.

event_name: Bhakti Fest BC Diwali Celebration
description: Spirituality • Hinduism ✨ Diwali Celebration – A Sacred Evening of Kirtan & Lakshmi Pooja ✨ Join us for a magical evening of devotion, music, and prayer with our celebrated presenters: 🎶 Naad Yogi Gurnimit Singh 🎶 Mark Benson & Tatiana Speed 🎶 Rising Sunkirtam 🎶 David Choy 🎶 Abneet Sandhar 🎶 Mamta Patil This special Bhakti Fest BC evening will be filled with kirtan and a sacred Lakshmi Pooja—an opportunity to sing your heart out and pray for abundance with Goddess Lakshmi.

event_name: Desde Adentro
description: An Avant-Garde Tango Theatre Performance with live music, dance & emotion. Experience Desde Adentro in Vancouver – Nov 2 Date and time Sunday, November 2 · 6 - 11pm PST. Doors at 5:45pm Location 154 E 10th Ave 154 East 10th Avenue Vancouver, BC V5T 1Z4 Get directions Good to know Highlights 5 hours In person Doors at 5:45 PM Highlights 5 hours In person Doors at 5:45 PM About this event Arts • Dance Buenos Aires soul meets the contemporary stage. Live music, immersive energy, and audience-in-the-room intensity. Step inside Desde Adentro — a contemporary tango-theatre performance blending live musicians, original choreography, and an atmosphere that feels like a night in Buenos Aires, reimagined in Vancouver. Raw, cinematic, and avant-garde. Directed and choreographed by Albano Goldenberg , a renowned maestro from Buenos Aires, together with an ensemble of Vancouver-based dancers and musicians, Desde Adentro invites you to experience tango from the inside out — the tension, the tenderness, the pulse. Expect contemporary staging, intimate proximity, and moments of audience participation that make the room part of the story. 🎟 Tickets are available exclusively via Showpass → https://www.showpass.com/desde-adentro/ Choose your showtime: 6:00 PM or 8:30 PM. Your ticket also includes entry to a social tango Milonga at 9:45 PM — the traditional gathering where tango is danced socially. If you attend the 8:30 PM show , simply stay after the performance. If you attend the 6:00 PM show , return at 9:45 PM to join the milonga! (Main Street is less than a 5-minute walk from the venue — perfect for a dinner or drink in between.) 📸 Photos by Yoon Seok Lee ⚠️ Accessibility Note: This performance involves standing and occasional movement between different parts of the venue. Please inform staff upon arrival if you have special needs or require assistance — we’ll be happy to help. description: After a day of fresh produce and local delights at our final Farmers Market of the 2025 season, keep the energy going with an evening of line dancing at the Red Barn! Whether you're a seasoned pro or a complete beginner, our friendly instructors will get you moving in no time. Bring your appetite, or work one up on the dance floor, because Yo Bones BBQ truck will be there too! Cash or card accepted at the bar serving select wines, beers and cocktails. description: Join Canned Heat students as they delve into the world of monsters and villains. A spooky and sexy dance show to celebrate Halloween! 1 hour 30 minutes, ages 18+, in person, free parking, doors at 6:45 PM, refunds up to 7 days before event.

description: Honour the memories of loved ones who’ve come before us in a celebration of LIFE this November 1st. Dia de los Muertos. Highlights ages 19+ In person Refund Policy Refunds up to 7 days before event

event_name: Dance Incubator Sharing | Peek Fest 2025
description: Dance Incubator is an evening for the contemporary dance community to come together.
location: 1609 Blanshard ST, VICTORIA, BC V8W2J5, CA

event_name: IGNITE! A Dance Victoria Launch Party
description: Join us for the 4th annual IGNITE! A Dance Victoria Launch Party, where we'll celebrate our 29th season of the World’s Best Dance. This year, we're amping up the festivities at a new location: KWENCH, the historic Pembroke Barn Building in the heart of Victoria’s arts and design district on Store Street. This 'co-working and culture club' is airy, welcoming, and gorgeous! At IGNITE!, you’ll enjoy: An intimate duet performance by Ballet Edmonton, tastings and cocktails curated by Phillips Brewing featuring their small batch distilled spirits, delicious savoury bites, plus sweet creations provided by Chocolat & Co., DJ LoFi, dancing, and the company of fellow arts-lovers, access to wide-ranging auction prizes in support of Dance Victoria.

event_name: Queer All Hallows Dance Party
description: Put on your costumes and join us for a macabre night of drag and dance. Local drag stars Billie Boy Toy-Ton and Sheila V Toff start off the night followed by Vancouver groovers, DJ Krista Mac and DJ Bella Sie, with some good vibes on the dance floor. Celebrate this All Hallows with local brews, a low-stim room, a big dance hall, a costume contest and some yummy treats (or tricks?). Let's get ready for winter with all our girls, gays and theys - this dance floor does not discriminate! It'll be an evening of music, performance, laughter and connection Sponsored by Kroffat Brake & Wheel.

event_name: Shade: Post Festival Party
description: Join us for a night of burlesque and drag hosted by Sylvester Stalletto at Friends of Dorothy! We are celebrating the successful run of Shade's inaugural International Burlesque Festival!

event_name: DJ & Music Curation
description: Receive guidance on how to proficiently use Traktor to create a streamlined musical journey. Traktor based: translates to other software.
location: DJ & Music Curation, Unknown, BC, CA

event_name: Dance Weavers ~ Conscious Dance Facilitator Training
description: An in-person immersion training on Salt Spring Island to gain confidence to learn to guide dances for your community.
location: 195 Byron, SALT SPRING ISLAND, BC V8K1C8, CA

event_name: Chest Fever: The Last Waltz - A Live Tribute To The Band's Farewell Concert
description: Join Chest Fever & friends for a tribute and celebration of The Band's 1976 iconic concert event - The Last Waltz. Featuring an all-star local horn section and local guests performing the well-loved roles of the original star-studded cast including Bob Dylan, Neil Young, Joni Mitchell and more.

event_name: Dance with the Devil
description: A wicked descent through the circles of Hell featuring burlesque, drag, pole & dance. Coming for you this October. Highlights ages 19+ In person Refund Policy No refunds Dress Code: Midnight Society Macabre; Black, and Red. Elegant mourning shrouds, Witchy couture.

event_name: Dance with the Devil
description: A wicked descent through the circles of Hell featuring burlesque, drag, pole & dance. Coming for you this October. Highlights ages 19+ In person Refund Policy No refunds Dress Code: Midnight Society Macabre; Black, and Red. Elegant mourning shrouds, Witchy couture.

event_name: Cacao & Dance Journey
description: A transformative journey of cacao, intuitive dance and community connection. Led by a carefully curated musical landscape, we will allow our bodies to move in whatever way feels right. Ending with a circle, we will have a chance to share, connect and honour the journey we experienced together.
location: Solwood Studio, 1303 Broad, Victoria, British Columbia, CA

event_name: Chamado do Samba; the calling that unites us
description: Chamado do Samba (The Calling of Samba) is a soul-stirring, rhythm-fueled journey into the heart of Brazil’s most iconic dance. This one-hour dance theatre experience fuses movement, music, and storytelling to explore the powerful, ancestral calling of Samba – a call that transcends language, culture, and borders.
location: The Dance Centre, 677 Davie, Vancouver, BC, CA

event_name: Saturday Night Party Pass! Cover + 3 Drinks Included!
description: The CABANA PARTY PASS Includes Cover, Priority Entry, 3 Drinks & is Valid All Night. A $50 Value for just $15! Supply is Limited so grab your party pass now to guarantee an amazing night out! Cabana is know for featuring Vancouver's best DJs who play a mix of Hip Hop, Top 40 & Dance Hits.

event_name: ALL IN ALL | GHAR JAISA MAHAUL
description: Celebrate Diwali with live performances, interactive art, and dance. Featuring Jugpreet Bajwa. Includes a $15 food coupon.

event_name: Beachtown Takeover 2025 Fall Festival
description: THE BIGGEST UNDERGROUND RAP FESTIVAL IN SURREY IS BACK NOV WE ARE BACK AT ELGIN HALL! WITH ARTISTS UNCUT XEN BBYCUBAN HEAVY BALENCI BEZEYYX2 AND MORE! TICKETS OUT NOW! $15 ONLINE via Eventbrite $20 AT THE DOOR DOORS OPEN AT 6:30PM SHOW STARTS AT 7:30PM CURFEW: 11PM ARRIVE AS EARLY AS POSSIBLE NO IN & OUTS AFTER 9:30PM *SET TIMES WILL BE POSTED ON THE DAY OF THE EVENT No WEAPONS NO DRINKING NO SMOKING NO DRUGS NO WEAPONS NO FIGHTS NO VIOLENCE! NO NEGATIVE VIBES MOSH & RAGE SAFELY! Have fun!

event_name: Garland of Unusual Rāgas with Arijit Mahalanabis
description: Scholar-vocalist Arijit Mahalanabis presents a specially curated Dhrupad recital featuring lesser-known rāgas, each revealing distinctive pathways of melody and emotion.
location: Vancouver Unitarians, 949 West 49th, Vancouver, BC V5Z 2T1, CA
source: Indian Classical Music Society of Vancouver

event_name: Halloween Dance! Dancing, Costumes & Good Times
description: Dance into Halloween at White Eagle Hall! Club Voltaire, Whiskey River & Elise LeBlanc bring music, costumes & fun. Prize For Best Costume, Full Bar Service

event_name: Rosh Chodesh Dance: Embodying the New Moon
description: Join Aliza Rothman for a creative journey through the Hebrew calendar. Spirituality • Judaism. A unique, creative journey through the Hebrew months. In this ongoing group, we come together to celebrate and embody the new moon and the themes of each month.

event_name: Free Salsa and Bachata Dance Lessons
description: Ready to get your hips moving, feet stomping, and heart pumping to the rollicking rhythms of la música latina? Whether you're a complete newbie or just looking to sharpen your skills, our fun and friendly classes will have you grooving in no time. Our absolute beginners class is absolutely free! Feel the energy, embrace the music, and unleash the dancer within! No partner? No problem—you’ll meet new friends while learning new moves.Two left feet? Don’t worry! We’ll have you grooving with confidence before you know it, and wondering why you didn’t start sooner.
source: Rueda De La Vida Dance Society

event_name: 7th Victoria International Kizomba Festival: Bachata & Kizomba
description: 4 days of workshops, 3 day-time socials, 4 nights of dancing, 30Hours + of workshops, 40+ Performances & Gala

event_name: Caliente Thursdays
description: Caliente Thursday event where DJs will play the best selection of Salsa, Bachata, Merengue and more.

event_name: Latino By Request: Halloween Edition 2.0
description: Two rooms. Two vibes. One unforgettable Latin night. Get ready for a spooktacular Latin fiesta where YOU choose the beats once you get your ticket! Whether you’re into Reggaeton, Salsa, Bachata, Merengue, and others we’ve got a dance floor waiting for you!
location: New Amsterdam Café, 301 Hastings, Vancouver, BC, CA

event_name: North Vancouver Salsa, Bachata, Kizomba Intimate & Cozy Latin Night
description: Intimate and cozy Latin night filled with music, dance, and connection in North Vancouver! Salsa, Bachata & Kizomba all night long!
location: 1312 Lonsdale, NORTH VANCOUVER, BC V7M 2H8, CA

event_name: Bachata Sensual Group Class in Richmond
description: 6-Week Bachata Sensual Group Class for all levels. Includes warmup, basic steps, turn techniques, and partner work.
price: $100 for 1 course, $180 for 2 courses, $25 per drop-in class

event_name: Pajama Jam Family Dance
description: A pajama-themed family dance party with concession and a Grade 5 bake sale. Tickets are limited due to capacity restrictions. Volunteers are needed for this event to help make it a success.

event_name: Caliente Salsa Saturdays
dance_style: salsa, bachata, merengue, cha cha cha
description: Join us for a fun night of dancing! No partner or experience required! 8:15pm Doors open, 8:30pm Beginner Salsa Lesson, 9:00pm-midnight dancing for all levels to Salsa, Bachata, Merengue & Cha Cha Cha. Ages 16+ welcome. CASH ONLY AT THE DOOR $15.00 per person.

description: Marc Destrubé, violin, Yariv Aloni, viola, Pamela Highbaugh Aloni, cello. Trios by Beethoven, Schubert, and Klein.

price: $47 Reserved Seating | $42 VJS Members (plus service charges)

event_name: Guided Práctica w/ Gabriela Condrea & Special Guest David Huh
description: Up-level your tango! David & Gabriela will be available for pointers, to troubleshoot, to hone in on what will take your embrace and connection to the next level, improve your technique, or to work on moves specific to you to help you find ease, softness (ablandar), structure, flow.
location: Phinney Center, 6532 Phinney, Seattle, WA 98103, US

event_name: Payadora Ensemble (Rose Gellert Hall Series)
description: Join us for a night of passionate tango music, performed by the internationally acclaimed chamber music ensemble!
